sourcesContent: import * as React from 'react'; import { StyleSheet, Text, View } from 'react-native'; import { ScrollView } from 'react-navigation'; import { device, gStyle } from '../constants'; // components import Categories from '../components/Categories'; import MediaItemScroller from '../components/MediaItemScroller'; import SlideShow from '../components/SlideShow'; // icons import SvgBackground from '../components/icons/Svg.Background'; // import SvgDisneyPlusLogo from '../components/icons/Svg.DisneyPlusLogo'; import SvgDisneyPlusLogo from '../assets/flicknplay.png'; const Home = () => ( {/* */} {/* Originals Recommended For You Hit Movies Trending Out of the Vault Ultra HD and HDR */} Banner Popular Films Marvel Cinematic Universe Coming Soon Dc Universe Horror Quentin Tarantino Movies Popular Series Mind-Bending Films Tim Burton Films Horror Series Mind-Bending Films Christmas Films Coming Soon Popular Disney Films Tim Burton Films ); const styles = StyleSheet.create({ containerHeader: { alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 8, paddingTop: device.iPhoneNotch ? 36 : 6 } }); export default Home;
